entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gore Bay
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this morning. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with snow changing to snow near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
